document_data.name: Snobeedle
document_data.mainbody: The '''Snobeedles''' were a family of [[halfling]]s who owned and ran the [[Snobeedle Orchard and Meadery]] in [[Undercliff]] just outside of [[Waterdeep]]. By {{Yearlink|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} they were Waterdeep's richest halfling family.
document_data.Members:
* [[Blossom Snobeedle]], an old [[druid]].
* [[Dasher Snobeedle]], a member who ran away to join a gang of halfling [[wererat]]s called the [[Shard Shunners]].
